Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class CustomStyledArea<P,R,T>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
org.fxmisc.richtext.GenericStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.CustomStyledArea<P,R,T>
Type Parameters:
P - paragraph style type
R - segment type (not used directly, but inherited)
T - text style type
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, org.fxmisc.flowless.Virtualized, org.fxmisc.richtext.ClipboardActions<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>, org.fxmisc.richtext.EditActions<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>, org.fxmisc.richtext.model.TwoDimensional, org.fxmisc.richtext.NavigationActions<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>, org.fxmisc.richtext.StyleActions<ParStyle,TextStyle>, org.fxmisc.richtext.TextEditingArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>, org.fxmisc.richtext.UndoActions, org.fxmisc.richtext.ViewActions<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>
public class CustomStyledArea<P,R,T> extends org.fxmisc.richtext.GenericStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle>
A custom rich text area based on GenericStyledArea that supports rich segments, styled paragraphs, list formatting, and AI integration.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomStyledArea

      public CustomStyledArea(ParStyle parStyle, BiConsumer<javafx.scene.text.TextFlow,ParStyle> paragraphStyler, TextStyle textStyle, RichTextOps<RichSegment,TextStyle> segmentOps, Function<org.fxmisc.richtext.model.StyledSegment<RichSegment,TextStyle>,javafx.scene.Node> nodeFactory)
      Constructs a CustomStyledArea with paragraph/text styles, segment ops, and a node factory.
      Parameters:
      parStyle - initial paragraph style
      paragraphStyler - function to apply paragraph styles to a TextFlow
      textStyle - initial text style
      segmentOps - segment operations for handling RichSegment
      nodeFactory - factory for creating display nodes for segments

  • Method Details

    • setAiConnector

      public void setAiConnector(AIConnector aiCon)
      Sets the AI connector used for generating or augmenting content.
      Parameters:
      aiCon - the AI connector instance

      public AIConnector getAiConnector()
      Returns the current AI connector used by this editor.
      Returns:
      the AI connector instance

    • deletePreviousChar

      public void deletePreviousChar()
      Overrides the deletion logic to safely delete ImageSegment instances when pressing backspace, especially handling edge cases like the start of a line.

    • applyParStyleToSelection

      public void applyParStyleToSelection(ParStyle style)
      Applies a paragraph style to all paragraphs within the current selection.
      Parameters:
      style - the paragraph style to apply

    • applyParStyleToParagraph

      public void applyParStyleToParagraph(int paragraphIndex, ParStyle style)
      Applies a paragraph style to a specific paragraph by index.
      Parameters:
      paragraphIndex - index of the paragraph
      style - the paragraph style to apply

    • refreshParagraphGraphics

      public void refreshParagraphGraphics()
      Refreshes the paragraph graphic factory to update bullet/number rendering.
